TerrainDef.label: supported sandstone foundation
TerrainDef.description: A sandstone platform built atop the roof of a lower level. It distributes weight and stabilizes the surface, making it safe to construct buildings and additional flooring above. If it breaks, buildings on top of it fall to the lower level.
